data.name: PrimaryEmailVerification
data.value:
Dear $FullName
Thank you for your time to register on UNHCR Syria Applications Portal
In order to make sure you are using a valid email address please verify your email please click $VerifyEmailAddressLink
If link is not working please copy the below link and paste it on your browser URL $Link
Please don't replay this email
Best regards, UNHCR Applications Portal Support Team

data.name: PrimaryEmailVerificationSubject
data.value: Apps Portal Email Verification

data.name: AccessRequestToSponsor
data.value:
Dear $SponsorFullName
$UserFullName, from $UserFullOrganizationName, requested access to UNHCR Applications Portal
Click $ReviewRequest to see the full details.
If link is not working please copy the below link and paste it on your browser URL $Link
Please don't replay this email
Best regards, UNHCR Applications Portal Support Team

data.name: AccessRequestToSponsorSubject
data.value: UNHCR Applications Portal Access Request

data.name: AccessRequestToUser
data.value:
Dear $UserFullName,
Your request has been sent to $SponsorFullName ($SponsorEmailAddress), $SponsorJobTitle at $SponsorOrganizationFullName successfully.
You will get another email once $SponsorFirstName response to your request.
If $SponsorFirstName will not response soon, please click $ChangeSponsor
If link is not working please copy the below link and paste it on your browser URL $Link
Please don't replay this email
Best regards, UNHCR Applications Portal Support Team

data.name: AccessRequestToUserSubject
data.value: UNHCR Applications Portal Access Request

data.name: SponsorSentMessage
data.value:
Dear $UserFullName,
Your request has been sent to $SponsorFullName ($SponsorEmailAddress), $SponsorJobTitle at $SponsorOrganizationInstance successfully. Please open your inbox for further information.
Thank you

data.name: VoteInvitationMessage
data.value:
Dear $FullName,
You were invited to the online vote Election $VoteName which will start in $InvitationDate and end in $CloseDate
If you would like to participate in voting, Please click this $VoteLink
If the above link is broken or unresponsive, please copy the below link and paste it on your browser URL $Link
Please don't replay this email
Best regards, UNHCR Applications Portal Support Team

data.name: VoteInvitationSubject
data.value: Vote Invitation

data.name: VoteInvitationFormat
data.value:
Dear Voter,
We would like to invite you to the online vote $VoteName which will take place in $InvitationDate.
In order to vote please click Link below
If link is not working please copy the below link and paste it on your browser URL Link
Please don't replay this email
Best regards, UNHCR Applications Portal Support Team

data.name: SponsorConfirmedAccount
data.value:
Dear $FullName
Your Account has been confirmed by $SponsorName , Kindly Follow the below link to complete your registration process $VerifyEmailAddressLink
If link is not working please copy the below link and paste it on your browser URL $Link
Please don't replay this email
Best regards, UNHCR Applications Portal Support Team

data.name: SponsorConfirmedAccountSubject
data.value: Sponsor Confirmed Your Account

data.name: AccessRequestToSponsorFailed
data.value:
Dear $UserFullName
Your access request to UNHCR Applications Portal has been rejected by Sponsor ( $SponsorFullName ) Click $ReviewRequest to change your sponsor.
If link is not working please copy the below link and paste it on your browser URL $Link Please don't replay this email Best regards, UNHCR Applications Portal Support Team

data.name: AccessRequestToSponsorFailedSubject
data.value: UNHCR Applocations Portal Access Rejected

data.name: ForgetPasswordEmailVerify
data.value:
Dear $FullName
The password for your ID ( $EmailAddress ) has been successfully reset.
If you didn’t make this change or if you believe an unauthorized person has accessed your account, go to $VerifyEmailAddressLink to reset your password immediately.
If link is not working please copy the below link and paste it on your browser URL $Link
Please don't replay this email
Best regards, UNHCR Applications Portal Support Team

data.name: ForgetPasswordEmailVerifySubject
data.value: Your ID password has been reset.

data.name: ItemModelVerification
data.value:
Dear $FullName,
The following equipment has been issued to you for use during your assignment/mission period.
As per the $VerifyStandard, you are requested to confirm the receipt of all items listed by clicking the confirmation link below(works from UNHCR Syria offices only). We’ll be grateful to doing so within 2 days from receiving this notification to avoid equipment issue/return process interruption and system records mismatch
Kindly note also, the equipment is to be used in accordance with the UNHCR policy for Asset Management Chapter 8: Supply Chain Section_7-2A1_STI Policy, roles and responsibilities of the Asset custodians, you are encouraged to read this document available on the UNHCR Intranet. Please note that the inclusion of the Cisco phone if any in the table below is not an indication that it was assigned to you as custodian, but only for asset management tracking purposes, please confirm that it is on your desk.
$Items
$VerifyLink $IssuedUser
For technical support, contact Syria - ICT Support <DLSyria-ICTSupport@unhcr.org>
Best regards UNHCR Syria ICT Unit

data.name: ItemModelVerificationSubject
data.value: STI - ICT item(s) release confirmation

data.name: ModelConfirmationReminder
data.value:
Dear $FullName This is a gentle reminder to confirm receiving the following items : $Items, Click $VerifyLink to view more details.
If link(works from UNHCR offices only) is not working please copy the below link and paste it on your browser $Link Please don't replay this email Best regards, UNHCR Applications Portal Support Team

For your kind information Thank you.

data.name: testError
data.value: test error

data.name: CustodianReturningItemReminder
data.value:
Dear $FullName,
ICT have been informed by HR that you will be leaving the operation shortly. Our records show that during your assignment/mission to Syria you were issued and still have under your custody the following ICT items:
$Items
•As per the Syria ICT SOP, you are required to return all items listed above before your departure, these are to be returned at your duty station or CO Damascus.
•You will not be allowed to travel to Beirut with any of the items.
•Before returning the items, you must ensure that you take a backup of all data on any of the devices which you may have been assigned (laptop/desktop/phone), you are also required to clear any passwords which you may have set especially on smartphones. If passwords are not cleared and the asset is not usable you may be requested to pay for the item.
•If you require assistance in preparing the assets for return as detailed above, please contact the ICT staff at your location or at CO Damascus.
$IssuedUser Thank you and best wishes for your future assignments
Best regards, UNHCR Syria ICT Unit

data.value:

$VerifyLink

data.name: TBSBillReadyEmail
data.value: Dear $FullName , Your $BillType bill for $BillMonthYear is ready for further processing at your end. To finalize your bill please follow below steps: 1. Access the system via https://prv.unhcrsyria.org/tbs (or click $IdentifyBillLinkIn to reach step 4 directly). 2. Click on “My Phone Bills”. 3. Select $BillMonthYear bill. 4. Identify private/official phone calls. 5. After identifying all records, in case there is private calls, specify the amount you want to pay in cash (optional). 6. Click on “Complete and Notify”. Refer to the $UserGuidLink for process details. Notes: 1. The process should be completed not later than $Deadline 2. Failing to meet the deadline, all calls will be considered “Private” and admin\finance unit will deduct its cost from the next salary cycle. Shall you have technical issues with the online system, forward this email to Syria – ICT Support DLSyria-ICTSupport@unhcr.org indicating your query/comments. Many thanks for your usual corporation. Best Regards. Syria IT Team

data.name: DangerPaySuccessFullySubmissionWithDates

Our records show that during your assignment/mission to Syria you were issued and still have under your custody the following ICT items: $Items •You will not be allowed to travel to other operation with any of the items. •Before returning the items, you must ensure that you take a backup of all data on any of the devices which you may have been assigned (laptop/desktop/phone), you are also required to clear any passwords which you may have set especially on smartphones. If passwords are not cleared and the asset is not usable you may be requested to pay for the item. •If you require assistance in preparing the assets for return as detailed above, please contact the ICT staff at your location or $IssuedUser Thank you and best wishes for your future assignments Best regards,

Kindly note also, the equipment is to be used in accordance with the UNHCR policy for Asset Management Chapter 8: Supply Chain Section_7-2A1_STI Policy, roles and responsibilities of the Asset custodians, you are encouraged to read this document available on the UNHCR Intranet.
Please note that the inclusion of the Cisco phone ( if any ) in the table below is not an indication that it was assigned to you as custodian, but only for asset management tracking purposes, please confirm that it is on your desk.”

data.name: GTPConfirmReceivingApplication
data.value:
Dear ($FullName),
Thank you for submitting your application for Group 2. We are pleased to inform you that UNHCR is in the process of reviewing your application for Group 2, allowing access for internal GS vacancies. Please note that UNHCR may contact you to provide supporting documents of your previous experience to facilitate the screening process.
You will receive our feedback within two weeks. For any support, please contact us through the mobile number 0998760790.
Best regards UNHCR Syria, Human Resources Unit

data.name: GTPEmailForSuccessfulApplicants
data.value:
Dear $FullName,
we are pleased to inform you that your applications for UNHCR Group 2 for General Service positions has been successful. You are now eligible to apply to internally advertised General Service (GS) positions in UNHCR Syria for a period of three years, until ($ExpiryDate). Internally advertised positions will be shared with you via your email address ($ApplicantEmailAddress). In case you want to change it, please log in to your account and add another email address and set it as preferred contact email. Kindly note that each position has its own eligibility requirements, and therefore we encourage you to consider carefully for which positions to apply. For each application, your eligibility will be checked against the criteria outlined in the job description, including academic criteria, work experience and reference checks. If you have not been recruited by the Organization in three years (when your group 2 membership expires), you will need to contact UNHCR again to re-apply to Group 2. We wish you the best with your future applications.
Kind regards, UNHCR Syria, Human Resources Unit

data.name: GTPEmailForUnsuccessfulApplicants
data.value:
Dear $FullName,
We regret to inform you that your applications for UNHCR Group 2 for General Service positions was not successful, as you do not fulfil the eligibility requirements. Although you are currently not eligible for Group 2, we encourage you to apply to our externally advertised vacancies that can be found on www.unhcr.org. We wish you the best with your future applications.
Kind regards, UNHCR Syria, Human Resources Unit

data.name: GTPNewApplicationHRNotification
data.value:
Dear HR Colleagues, $FullName completed the Group 2 Application.

data.name: FinalApproval_Agency
data.value:
Dear PSEA assessment task force members,

The partner @PartnerName has now approved the final assessment of PSEA capacity.
Your final score is @Score which indicates that your organization has @Rate capacity on PSEA.
You may want to proceed with the development of a PSEA capacity enhancement plan,

Warm regards,

data.name: FinalApproval_Partner
data.value:
Dear @Name

This is a confirmation that you have accepted the final assessment of your organization’s PSEA capacity.
Your final score is @Score which indicates that your organization has @Rate capacity on PSEA.
You will be contacted in the upcoming weeks by PSEA assessment task force for the development of a PSEA capacity enhancement plan,

Warm regards,

data.name: PartnersAssessmentPart_Agency
data.value:
Dear PSEA assessment task force members

@Name who is PSEA focal point of @PartnerName has completed the self-assessment of his organization’s PSEA capacity. You may now access the assessment following the below link @Link.
Kindly review carefully the answers provided by the partner, and add your own answer and comments on every question of the assessment. You may want to reach out to @PartnerName to seek more clarification before completing the assessment.

Warm regards,

data.name: PartnersAssessmentPart_Partner
data.value:
Dear @Name

Thank you very much for completing the partner’s PSEA self-assessment. You can now access your self-assessment following the below link. @Link
Your assessment will now be reviewed by the PSEA assessment task force and you’ll receive an email once the review is completed.
PSEA assessment task force members may get in touch with you in the upcoming days to seek clarification on the answers you provided.

Warm regards,

data.name: UNAssessmentPart_Agency
data.value:
Dear PSEA assessment task force members,

This is a confirmation that you’ve completed the assessment of @PartnerName. A link was shared with the focal point for his confirmation and agreement on the assessment you provided.
Once the partner confirms, you will receive a confirmation email.

Warm regards,

data.name: UNAssessmentPart_Partner
data.value:
Dear @Name

The PSEA Task Force has now completed the UN assessment phase of your organization’s PSEA capacity.
Your final score is @Score which indicates that your organization has @Rate capacity on PSEA.
You may now access the final assessment following this link @Link to review the Task Force scoring and comments. If you agree with the final assessment, kindly confirm by clicking on the confirm button at the bottom of the assessment.
You may want to reach out to the PSEA Task Force for more clarification or review of the final assessment.

Warm regards,
